text: Nza maaŋ kav, nza Sabatar vov mba, ŋgu bakɨmen bɨna thɨmkamani mbugum kɨrar hegap, wari vov mbɨ mben taan vegi. Nza khueŋ ndɨkndɨga wari vegi, nza Fhe Bakɨme phorgɨ suanga ŋana thueŋ ki thi. Nza ne suaŋgia vov, mba mbɨn taan vegap, nza mbigi mbari garim, mbe phoga vhuigap wari ki. Nza mbe gangiap, nza mben haa piigiap, mbe phorga nzuai.
